Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.cli

Class CommandLineParser<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.cli.CommandLineParser<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - class of the parameter object, which later holds the parsed parameter values
    public class CommandLineParser<T>
extends Object
    Helper class, which automatically converts a list of arguments from the command line into a parameter object and vice versa.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CommandLineParser​(Class<T> parameterClass)
      Constructs a new CLIParser with a class of the parameter object, which later holds the parameter values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLineParser

        public CommandLineParser​(Class<T> parameterClass)
        Constructs a new CLIParser with a class of the parameter object, which later holds the parameter values. This must also declare all command line related properties, such as the name of the option and its description. For this, the fields in the given class need to be public and need to be annotated with CommandLineOption. Everything else is done by this parser.

    • Method Detail

      • parseArguments

        public final T parseArguments​(String[] args,
                              T parameters)
                       throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Parses a list of arguments (POSIX style) and writes the set values into the given parameter object. The parameter object should be of the same class as this parser is initialized with.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException

      • transformToArguments

        public final List<String> transformToArguments​(T parameters)
        Transforms the object, which holds the parameter values into a list of arguments, which can be used to start MOSAIC processes with valid arguments.

      • printHelp

        public void printHelp​(PrintWriter printWriter)

      • printHelp

        public void printHelp()

      • getOptions

        public final org.apache.commons.cli.Options getOptions()
        Returns:
        all options declared in the parameter object this parser has been initialized with
